data.comment: Today's referee, Armando Villarreal, has blown to start the match.
Dallas have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 1, Goal kick for Nashville at Toyota Stadium.
Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Dallas.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a Nashville throw-in in Dallas's half.
In the minute 4, Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ryan Hollingshead (Dallas) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Dallas capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nashville's half?
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Nashville at Toyota Stadium.
Free kick for Dallas in the half of Nashville.
Armando Villarreal awards Nashville a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Frisco a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 17, Throw-in high up the field for Nashville in Frisco.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frisco.
Dallas's Franco Jara gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 18, Nashville have a goal kick.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Dallas's Franco Jara is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 20, Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
Free kick Nashville.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Nashville.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Dallas to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Dallas close to the penalty box.
Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for Dallas, close to Nashville's area.
Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Dallas.
In the minute 28, Brayan Beckeles is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Dallas in the half of Nashville.
In the minute 34, Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Frisco Nashville drive forward through Daniel Rios. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 35, Nashville have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Throw-in Dallas.
In the minute 36, In Frisco a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Daniel Lovitz (Nashville) has received a yellow card from Armando Villarreal.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
In Frisco Nashville attack through Hany Mukhtar. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville.
Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 45, At Toyota Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dallas needs to be cautious. Nashville have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Dallas needs to be cautious. Nashville have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Dallas's Franco Jara gets in a shot on goal at Toyota Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Armando Villarreal has blown to start the second-half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 47, In Frisco, Daniel Rios (Nashville) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
Nashville to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
In the minute 49, Randall Leal of Nashville smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Dallas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Anibal Godoy gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nashville.
Dallas pushes forward through Franco Jara, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal kick for Nashville at Toyota Stadium.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Nashville in the half of Dallas.
Dallas have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Nashville in Frisco.
In the minute 55, Armando Villarreal awards Dallas a goal kick.
Dallas are in shooting range from this free kick.
Dave Romney (Nashville) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 58, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Nashville are pushing forward but Anibal Godoy's finish is wide of the goal.
Armando Villarreal awards Dallas a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Ricardo Pepi is replacing Franco Jara for the home team.
Luchi Gonzalez is making the team's second substitution at Toyota Stadium with Paxton Pomykal replacing Jesus Ferreira.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 61, Dallas drives forward and Bryan Acosta gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Toyota Stadium, Paxton Pomykal has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 64, Free kick in a good position for Dallas!
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Dallas close to the penalty box.
Randall Leal for Nashville has been booked by Armando Villarreal and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 65, Dallas have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Hany Mukhtar (Nashville) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Armando Villarreal signals a Nashville throw-in in Dallas's half.
In the minute 67, The away team replace Brayan Beckeles with Alistair Johnston.
Nashville make their second substitution with Abu Danladi replacing Daniel Rios.
In the minute 68, Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for Nashville, close to Dallas's area.
Armando Villarreal awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
In the minute 71, Free kick Nashville.
Throw-in for Nashville close to the penalty box.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 74, Dallas's Bryan Acosta misses with an attempt on goal.
Nashville have a goal kick.
Tanner Tessmann is on a sub for Thiago Santos for Dallas.
In the minute 74, Zdenek Ondrasek is replacing Reto Ziegler for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
The away team have replaced Derrick Jones with Dominique Badji. This is the third substitution made today by Gary Smith.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Dallas.
Ryan Hollingshead's header is off-target for Dallas.
Goal kick for Nashville at Toyota Stadium.
In the minute 81, Reggie Cannon for Dallas drives towards goal at Toyota Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Dallas's Bryan Acosta breaks free at Toyota Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Nashville have a goal kick.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 82, David Accam is replacing Randall Leal for the away team.
Matt LaGrassa is on a sub for Hany Mukhtar for Nashville.
In the minute 83, Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Dallas.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 86, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through David Accam.
Great play from Dax McCarty to set up the goal.
Dallas make their fifth substitution with Fafa Picault replacing Michael Barrios.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Frisco.
Goal kick for Nashville at Toyota Stadium.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
In Frisco, Matt Hedges of Dallas is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Dallas.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Nashville will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Dallas.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Frisco. The final score is 0-1.
